description:
This course is a short collection of simple and easy to cook Japanese pork dishes. In this course you will learn new pork recipes and different ways to cook it in Japan. Whether you're in the mood for stir-frying, deep frying, braising, simmering, boiling, you name it, you'll learn different ways to cook pork in this fun and exciting cooking class.

A bonus to this class is a Japanese language lesson as you'll need to learn Japanese cooking methods such as katsu and tatsuta-age and different Japanese terms for the ingredients of some recipes.

The lectures in this course include the following:

  • detailed list of ingredients
  • estimated cooking time
  • calorie count for those who are careful
  • simple explanations of the step by step cooking procedure
  • a fun time lapse cooking video with text overlay
  • helpful notes and tips about Japanese cooking
  • printable copy of the recipe

If you don't want to worry about what to cook for tonight's dinner or for tomorrow or for the whole month, better enroll in this class. I'm sure the people you'll prepare these dishes for will be glad.
title: 25 Japanese Pork Dishes, Quick and Easy Family Style Recipes
